FAQ_ITEMS.question: How long does it take to see results?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Most customers notice improvements in skin brightness and texture within 7-14 days of consistent use.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Is this suitable for sensitive skin?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes! Our formula is gentle and suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. We recommend patch testing before first use.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: How should I use this serum?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Apply 2-3 drops to clean, dry skin morning and evening. Follow with your favorite moisturizer and sunscreen during the day.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: What makes this different from other serums?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Our unique formula combines clinical-grade vitamin C, hyaluronic acid, and peptides in optimal concentrations for maximum effectiveness.
